posts.post_title: 1895 N300 Mayo's Cut Plug George Haddock - SGC 5 -EX - Highest Graded
posts.post_content:
1895 Mayo's Cut Plug (N300) George Haddock. Highest Graded SGC 5 - EX for corner and edge wear. Free of any creases or wrinkles and has a superb image quality.  
SGC population of 2 with none higher and only 16 graded in total.
$975 delivered, thanks for looking.
eBay user ID megalodonteeth - multiple successful sales on Net54
